paper_abstract: A novel compensation method for right-angled bend, T-junction, and cross-junction is presented. This method uses defected ground structures (DGS) to accomplish the compensation task. Special design graphs are provided to ease further designs. Three prototypes are designed and fabricated. The simulation and measurement results are in good agreement. (C) 2012 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Int J RF and Microwave CAE 23: 260-271, 2013.
